1450060.name: Down and Out
1450060.description:
Down and Out is a fresh take on the fighting game genre, combining freestyle combat with seamless open-world exploration- in a truly immersive, first-person VR experience.


Experience the life of a powerful street brawler in Down and Out. Welcome to the dangerous and beautiful world of Grande City, where the risks are great, but the rewards are even greater! Fight to survive- and for riches and power- as you rise from nothing to become the undisputed king of the streets!

In Down and Out, play as a street fighter seeking their fortune in the streets of Grande City. Make your way to the top as you take on rivals for cash and glory, roam freely around the city, or do quests and reap their rewards in money and reputation! Made for veterans of fighting games and new players alike, Down and Out blends the best of your favorite brawlers with the immersion of first-person VR. You might start with nothing, but with the right skills and grit, the riches and rewards of Grande City will be yours for the taking.

Are you ready to rise to the challenge?


  • A brand-new world invites you to make your mark. Freestyle fighting meets open-world playstyle in Down and Out, where you fight to survive on the streets of Grande City. In these circles, might makes right, and the weak struggle to survive. Make your way through the dangerous yet immensely rewarding world of Down and Out in first-person VR, whether following the meticulously crafted questlines, fighting your way through hordes of vicious enemies, or exploring every corner of the city for its secrets and rewards.
  • Unique and eye-popping graphics! Bold visuals bring Down and Out to life in a catchy mix of realism and cel-shaded, comic book inspired graphics, fully integrated into a seamless Virtual Reality experience. Explore vivid locations inspired by real-life megacities, and meet (and battle!) unique NPCs. The brutal world of street fighting has never looked better!
  • Let your fists do the talking. Down and Out’s combat system is tailored for VR and easy to learn. Fight in any way you want, with your movements guiding your attacks in the game. Hammer your enemies with powerful punches, or watch for an opening and strike with surgical precision- the choice is all yours!
  • Don’t get overconfident! In Down and Out, AI enemies adapt to your fighting style. Stay on your toes as you fight because your enemies are watching! The game’s AI learns from your fighting style and adapts, forcing you to mix it up if you want to win! Every fight promises a new challenge. Are you up for it?
  • See the sights of Grande City! Explore the open world of Grande City- full of hidden secrets just waiting to be discovered by an intrepid explorer! Take a break from fighting to walk and ride a bicycle around the city, feed and befriend adorable stray dogs and make them into loyal companions. You can even play a quick basketball game, mark out your territory on the street with custom graffiti, or just grab a bite from a food stall - the streets are full of possibilities and excitement.
  • Rags to Riches: Use the hard-earned cash won from your battles- or found around the city- to deck out your fighter in custom gear for that extra swagger! But be sure to stock up on essentials like food or healing items, or your next fight may be your last.
  • Dynamic and exciting gameplay. Whether fighting your way through the game’s storyline, simply chilling out and exploring the city and streets, or taking part in the mini-games and side activities- Down and Out promises fresh gameplay and exciting prospects at every corner. There’s never a dull moment in Grande City. Be careful, though- draw too much attention, and you’ll find yourself on the run from the law!



With its immersive visuals, engaging gameplay, and unique story, Down and Out allows players to test their mettle on the streets. So get ready to carve out your destiny on the city streets with only your fists (and VR controllers)!

Down and Out is now available on Playstation Store (PSVR2/PVSR1), AppLab (Meta Quest2/Meta Quest1), and on Oculus Store (Oculus Rift S).
